verses.roman:
āra dina kahena prabhu,--'paḍa, purīdāsa'
ei śloka kari' teṅho karilā prakāśa

synonyms: āra dina—another day; kahena prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; paḍa—recite; purīdāsa—Purīdāsa; ei—this; śloka—verse; kari'-making; teṅho—he; karilā prakāśa—manifested.
translation: Another day, when Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said to the boy, "Recite, My dear Purīdāsa," the boy composed the following verse and expressed it before everyone.
